titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd at the funeral of George Payne, jun Son of George Payne, an apothecary. March 6. 1699/700. At Midhurst in Sussex. And publish'd at the request of his friends. By Richard Oliver, curate of Midhurst.
titleStmt.author: Oliver, Richard, b. 1651.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Arthur Bettesworth, at the Red Lion on London Bridge: and sold by John Colebrook in Midhurst, and William Webb in Chichester, booksellers,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Red Lion on London Bridge:
